text: 18.22 Ais 24.8, Jer 25.10, Ese 26.13 Babilon binɨb tep gaknɨŋ kɨmep agɨlɨg, akɨl kubap chɨb pugɨlɨg, gawb gita tap okok pakɨlɨg nab nak pi ak ma yenɨgabal agak.18.22-23 Jer 7.34, 25.10 Wog adek keke gɨpal tek, nab nak pi ak ma yenɨgabal agak. Wit mɨdup pak chɨb jakɨl pilawa gɨpal tek, nab nak pi ak kab tek ak kɨlɨlɨg ma agɨnɨgab agak.
